title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 582.3 - Criteria for approval of local land use programs relative to a geographic portion of a local government
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 582.3 - Criteria for approval of local land use programs relative to a geographic portion of a local government

State Regulations
A local land use program submitted for approval relative to
a significant geographical portion of a local government pursuant to section
807(4) of the Adirondack Park Agency Act shall be approved if the criteria of
section
582.2
of this Part are met with
respect to such portion. The transfer of jurisdiction referred to in section
582.1
of this Part shall occur only
in those portions subject to such controls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
582.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
